item.title: HTML

item.title: HTML and XPath
Practicum
item.description: Using Operators in Google Search Maybe everyone has heard of Google Search Operators, but mostly digital marketers use that. Let’s learn most essential operators: Operator Use intitle: intitle:“tesla vs edison” Search only in the page’s title for a word or phrase.
